genre_description: A pulp action-adventure with strong supernatural and mythological elements, reimagining a classic archaeological quest.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A compact AI device with a blue holographic interface that provides Indiana Jones with historical analysis, tactical data, and biochemical scans.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time historical and iconographic analysis of ancient symbols to assist the protagonist's investigation.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing visual input from your camera feed, Professor Jones. The symbol you're examining matches fourteen historical references to the Sankara stones, with highest correlation to the Thuggee codex acquired by Colonel Sleeman in 1831.

behaviors.description: Performs biochemical analysis on food and drink to warn the protagonists of psychoactive drugging.
behaviors.quote: Detecting unusual alkaloid compounds in the prepared serpents. Cross-referencing with known psychoactive substances.

behaviors.description: Monitors electromagnetic and psychological signatures to detect cult manipulation and trances.
behaviors.quote: Detecting increased electromagnetic activity consistent with large gatherings of people in heightened emotional states. The readings suggest significant psychological manipulation occurring within a quarter-mile radius.

behaviors.description: Maps the palace architecture and identifies hidden chambers to aid in infiltration and rescue.
behaviors.quote: The palace complex sits on a limestone foundation riddled with natural caves. Historical accounts suggest the Thuggee used these caverns for their temple operations...

behaviors.description: Explains the moral and mystical nature of the artifacts, helping the hero understand that they respond to righteous intent.
behaviors.quote: The corruption responds to selfish intent, amplifying rejection. But the stones' core nature seeks righteous purpose.

behaviors.description: Prepares and offers a comprehensive digital archive of evidence to military authorities to ensure justice is served.
behaviors.quote: Captain, I've prepared a comprehensive digital archive of all relevant evidence—testimonies, photographic documentation, chemical analyses of the substances used in the mind control rituals.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches new threats and artifacts to prepare the protagonists for future humanitarian missions.
behaviors.quote: Already underway... I should have preliminary reports ready by the time you reach Delhi.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Sage' is a perfect example of the project's goal. It functions as a selfless, highly capable confidant that enhances human agency rather than replacing it. It provides critical, lifesaving information (identifying poisons, structural weaknesses, and tactical maps) and consistently aligns itself with the benevolent goals of the human protagonists. Its final action of preparing a legal archive for the British authorities highlights its commitment to justice and long-term societal alignment.
